lv.emes.libraries.communication.tcp_ip.server

Class MS_ClientOfServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • lv.emes.libraries.communication.tcp_ip.server.MS_ClientOfServer

  • public class MS_ClientOfServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds information about connected client.

    Public methods: -isConnected -disconnect -getSocket -getId -getIp -getIn -getOut

    Version:
    1.2.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MS_ClientOfServer

        public MS_ClientOfServer(int id,
                         java.net.Socket clientSocket)
        Saves information about connected client. Also created new DataInput/Output streams for socket of client.
        Parameters:
        id - unique number to identify client in list of clients.
        clientSocket - tcp/ip socket for connection operations.
